ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: * Zyber had finished collecting the herbs in which she needed and had headed back to Rowdy Wolf s cave, she walked into his cave in her robot mode and smiled

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>


* Zyber had finished collecting the herbs in which she needed and had headed back to Rowdy Wolf's cave, she walked into his cave in her robot mode and smiled as she saw Striker sitting up.
She walked over to him and kneeled down beside him on the floor, while taking the bowl that had dampened the fur and refilling it she answered his recent question:*

" You are in a cave owned by Rowdy Wolf, you had passed out from major damage and we had recovered you."

* Zyber took the stalks of the devil's club in her hand and then, with a sigh since she knew this would hurt, squeezed a certain amount of the stalks juice into the water the started on the pond lilies.
Once a greenish colored liquid was present in the bowl she stirred it and then held it towards Striker, it smelt strongly of mint but had a nasty taste to it.
This particular mixture may taste bad but it was guaranteed to repair any internal damages that one might have, it had come in handy when she had once been run through by a particularly stubborn caribou.
Zyber smiled at Striker.*

" Here, drink this. It will repair all internal damages in which you might have. It also helps headaches and other forms of bodily annoyances."

* She kept the liquid in her hands for Striker to take, she knew that if Rowdy didn't want this Maximal in his den then she could move him to hers. Just for the duration of his healing anyway.*

__________________________________________

* Iron Raptor landed with a soft thud on the ground below, to make sure that her signature wasn't detected she transformed into her beast mode.
Now in familiar scales she looked at Prowl and narrowed her eyes at his comment, she then moved off towards the new base with stealth but had one last thing to say.*

" Thanks!"
